game_description: Vertical EscapeRoom is a VR tech demo with state-of-the-art grab and manipulation mechanics as well as an avatar. All powered by UltimateXR. You use the elevator to move from level to level, solve tasks and unlock the next level. VR newcomers are introduced to the mechanics bit by bit and experience what the virtual world has to offer. - find solutions - stack dice in the right order - clear all cans on can knockdown - sweat on the hot-wire - play goalkeeper and catch the right balls - teleport through hallways and the universe - play mini golf to unlock your way
review_1: The thing that surprises me the most is the quality of the graphics with such a good performance (90fps). Some levels are harder than others, but they can be completed in a way or another. The thing I love the most is the transition between levels, which reminds me of the game Portal :)
review_2: If I had looked at the store screenshots I might have tried harder.
